```{r}

```


```{r}
muts.events <- import.data("../Data/mutation_events.tsv")
chrom.events <- import.data("../Data/chrom_events.tsv")

```


```{r}
muts %>%
  rename(gene=sample) %>%
  filter(gene %in% muts.events$gene) %>% 
  gather(id, mut.status, -gene)
```
